body:
On 06/29/2010 10:19 AM, Thomas Bleicher wrote:
> I wrote a simple converter in Python a few years ago. It was rather
> limited, though, and only dealt with POV files created by Dialux.


Guess that won't work for me, I'm looking more for some general converter as
we're facing the problem that povray is not free according to the Debian Free
Software Guidelines, so we can't use it to render stuff for Debian main. Any
other povray replacements woruld work for me, too, of course :)


Thanks and cheers,


Bernd




 Bernd Zeimetz                            Debian GNU/Linux Developer
 http://bzed.de                                http://www.debian.org
